comments:
Build ID: I20070608-1718

Steps To Reproduce:
0.run eclipse in debug mode with STP debug messages enabled
1.Install SOA Tools from Europa Update site
2.Configure APACHE CXF to installation dir (use cxf-2.0-incubator-RC)
3.Create simple JAX-WS Java first Project
4.Create interface or class
5.Create WebService through JAX-WS Tools on created interface/class
6.No wsdl file created, error in console (see more Information)


More information:
 ERROR -- org.eclipse.stp.sc.cxf.generators.CeltixJavaToWsdlGenerator -- Celtix Java To Wsdl Generation failure

-------------
This class is in project JAVA_BUILD_PATH in following jar file CXF_HOME_rest/lib/cxf-2.0-incubator-RC.jar

From the error message, the cxf plugin used here is old.
You can try the latest cxf plguin from this url.
http://people.apache.org/repo/m2-snapshot-repository/org/apache/cxf/cxf-eclipse-plugin/2.1-incubator-SNAPSHOT/

Since apache cxf 2.0 final release is just out this week, i will update our build/site/wiki to point to the latest cxf plugin.

I tried to install new cxf-plugin 2.1 as you suggested. Nothing changed.

I also moved to the last Eclipse Europa Integration build (I20070621-1340). STP plugin is in version 0.5.0

please reference the wiki page on how to use the jaxws function:
http://wiki.eclipse.org/STP_Service_Creation_getting_started

If you are using Eclipse3.3, please add -Dorg.osgi.framework.bootdelegation=* in eclipse.ini before start eclipse as pointed out in the wiki.

My problem:
-----------------------------------------------
According to http://wiki.eclipse.org/STP_Service_Creation_getting_started I've installed and setup everything. I Installed STP trough Update manager with full dependencies, so there was no need to additionally install GEF, EMF, etc.
The result of WSDL generation feature was ERROR.

I've also tried other combinations of CXF runtime / CXF plugin. Nothing worked!
List of runtimes/plugins tried:
apache-cxf-2.0-incubator-20070619.165612-4.zip
apache-cxf-2.1-incubator-20070710.152014-4.zip
cxf-distribution-2.0-incubator-20070606.203457-21.zip
cxf-eclipse-plugin-2.0-incubator-20070619.165612-26.zip
cxf-eclipse-plugin-2.1-incubator-20070704.115632-3.zip
cxf-eclipse-plugin-2.1-incubator-20070710.152014-5.zip
